name: Tomato Pasta
steps: Bring a large pot of salted water to a rolling boil
Cook pasta according to package directions until al dente, then drain reserving ½ cup pasta water
While pasta cooks, heat oil in a skillet over medium heat and sauté minced garlic for 30 seconds
Add diced tomatoes, salt, and a pinch of pepper; cook for 8-10 minutes until sauce thickens
Toss drained pasta into the sauce, adding pasta water as needed for consistency
Garnish with fresh basil leaves and serve immediately

name: Cheese Sandwich
steps: Spread butter evenly on one side of each bread slice
Place cheese between the unbuttered sides
Heat a skillet over medium heat and grill buttered-side down for 2-3 minutes
Flip carefully and grill the other side until golden brown and cheese is melted
Cut diagonally and serve hot

name: Veg Omelette
steps: Crack 3 eggs into a bowl, add salt and pepper, and whisk until frothy
Finely dice onion, tomato, and bell pepper
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat with a little oil
Add diced vegetables and sauté for 2 minutes until slightly soft
Pour egg mixture over the vegetables and swirl to cover the pan evenly
Cook undisturbed for 2 minutes, then gently fold in half
Slide onto a plate and serve immediately

name: Fried Rice
steps: Use day-old cold rice for best results (or spread freshly cooked rice on a tray to cool)
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat
Add minced garlic and stir for 15 seconds until fragrant
Push garlic aside, crack egg into wok and scramble
Add diced carrot and beans, stir-fry for 2-3 minutes
Add cold rice, breaking up clumps, and toss everything together
Drizzle soy sauce around the edges of the wok and stir-fry for 2 more minutes
Serve hot, garnished with spring onions if desired

name: Salad Bowl
steps: Wash and pat dry all vegetables
Tear lettuce into bite-sized pieces
Dice tomato and cucumber into small cubes
Combine all vegetables in a large bowl
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for dressing
Drizzle dressing over salad, toss gently, and serve

name: Chicken Curry
steps: Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces and marinate with salt and turmeric for 15 min
Heat oil in a heavy-bottomed pan; add cumin seeds until they splutter
Add finely chopped onions and sauté until golden brown (8-10 min)
Add garlic-ginger paste and cook for 1 minute
Add pureed tomatoes, garam masala, chili powder, and cook until oil separates (5 min)
Add marinated chicken and stir to coat with the masala
Add ½ cup water, cover, and cook on medium heat for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan

name: Veggie Stir Fry
steps: Cut broccoli into small florets; julienne carrot and bell pepper
Mince garlic and ginger finely
Heat 2 tbsp oil in a wok over high heat until smoking
Add garlic and ginger, stir for 15 seconds
Add carrots first (they take longest), stir-fry 2 min
Add broccoli and bell pepper, stir-fry 2-3 minutes keeping vegetables crisp
Drizzle soy sauce and toss everything together for 30 seconds
Serve immediately over steamed rice

name: Pancakes
steps: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and a pinch of salt
In a separate bowl, whisk milk, egg, and melted butter
Pour wet ingredients into dry and stir until just combined (lumps are OK)
Heat a non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat and lightly butter
Pour ¼ cup batter per pancake; cook until bubbles form on surface (2 min)
Flip and cook other side for 1-2 minutes until golden
Stack pancakes and serve with maple syrup, fresh berries, or whipped cream

name: Grilled Cheese
steps: Butter one side of each bread slice generously
Layer cheese between the non-buttered sides
Place sandwich buttered-side down in a preheated skillet on medium-low heat
Cook slowly for 3-4 minutes until bottom is golden and cheese begins to melt
Flip carefully and cook the other side for 2-3 minutes
Press down gently with spatula, cut in half, and serve while cheese is gooey

name: Mushroom Soup
steps: Clean and slice mushrooms; dice onion and mince garlic
Melt butter in a large pot over medium heat
Add onion and cook until translucent (5 min)
Add garlic and thyme, cook 1 minute
Add sliced mushrooms and cook until they release their liquid and brown (8-10 min)
Add 3 cups vegetable broth, bring to a boil, then simmer 15 minutes
Use an immersion blender to puree until smooth (or leave some chunks for texture)
Stir in cream, season with salt and pepper, and serve with crusty bread

name: Fruit Smoothie
steps: Peel banana and hull strawberries
Add banana, strawberries, and milk to a blender
Drizzle honey to taste
Blend on high for 30-60 seconds until completely smooth
Taste and adjust sweetness if needed
Pour into a glass and serve immediately

name: Chole Masala
steps: If using dried chickpeas, soak overnight and pressure cook until tender; or drain canned chickpeas
Heat oil in a pan; add cumin seeds and let them splutter
Add finely chopped onions and fry until dark golden (10 min)
Add garlic-ginger paste, cook 1 minute
Add pureed tomatoes, garam masala, coriander powder, and turmeric
Cook until oil separates from the masala (5-7 min)
Add cooked chickpeas and 1 cup water; simmer for 15-20 minutes
Mash a few chickpeas with the back of a spoon to thicken the gravy
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or bhature

name: Garlic Bread
steps: Preheat oven to 375°F (190°C)
Mince garlic finely and mix with softened butter and chopped parsley
Slice baguette in half lengthwise
Spread garlic butter generously on cut sides
Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10-12 minutes until edges are golden
Slice into portions and serve warm

name: Veggie Burger
steps: Mash cooked black beans in a bowl, leaving some chunks
Mix in breadcrumbs, diced onion, salt, pepper, and cumin
Form mixture into patties and refrigerate for 15 min to firm up
Cook patties in an oiled skillet over medium heat, 4 min per side
Toast buns lightly on the pan
Assemble: bottom bun, lettuce, patty, tomato slice, cheese, top bun
Serve with your favorite condiments

name: Oatmeal Porridge
steps: Combine oats and milk in a saucepan (1:2 ratio)
Add a pinch of cinnamon and salt
Bring to a gentle boil over medium heat, stirring frequently
Reduce heat and simmer for 5-7 minutes until thick and creamy
Slice banana and arrange on top
Drizzle with honey and serve warm

name: Paneer Butter Masala
steps: Cut paneer into 1-inch cubes; lightly fry until golden and set aside
In the same pan, add butter and sauté diced onions until soft (5 min)
Add garlic-ginger paste and cook 1 minute
Add pureed tomatoes, garam masala, red chili powder, and turmeric
Cook until the sauce thickens and oil separates (8-10 min)
Add cream and stir until smooth
Add fried paneer cubes and simmer for 5 minutes on low heat
Garnish with cream drizzle and kasuri methi; serve with naan or rice

name: Veg Spring Rolls
steps: Finely shred cabbage and julienne carrots
Heat oil in a wok; add minced garlic and stir 15 seconds
Add vegetables and stir-fry on high heat for 2-3 minutes until slightly wilted
Season with soy sauce, salt, and pepper; let cool
Place 2 tbsp filling on each wrapper and roll tightly, sealing edges with water
Heat oil for deep frying to 350°F (175°C)
Fry spring rolls in batches for 3-4 minutes until golden and crispy
Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet chili sauce

name: Masala Dosa
steps: Boil potatoes, peel, and mash roughly
Heat oil in a pan; add mustard seeds and curry leaves until they splutter
Add chopped onions and sauté until translucent
Add turmeric, green chilies, and mashed potato; mix well and set filling aside
Heat a flat griddle (tawa) and grease lightly
Pour a ladleful of rice batter and spread in a thin circle using the back of the ladle
Drizzle oil around edges; cook until bottom turns golden and crispy
Place potato filling in the center, fold dosa over, and serve with chutney and sambar

name: Chocolate Mug Cake
steps: In a microwave-safe mug, mix flour, cocoa powder, sugar, and a pinch of salt
Add milk and melted butter; stir until smooth with no lumps
Optionally add a few chocolate chips on top
Microwave on high for 1 minute 30 seconds (time may vary by microwave)
Let cool for 1 minute — the center should be slightly gooey
Eat directly from the mug with a spoon

name: Lemon Rice
steps: Cook rice and spread on a plate to cool; each grain should be separate
Heat oil; add mustard seeds, peanuts, and curry leaves; fry until peanuts are golden
Add slit green chilies and turmeric powder
Add the cooled rice and gently mix without breaking grains
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the rice and toss
Season with salt, garnish with fresh cilantro, and serve

name: Tacos al Pastor
steps: Marinate thinly sliced pork in a blend of dried chilies, achiote paste, vinegar, and pineapple juice for at least 2 hours
Thread marinated pork onto a vertical spit or arrange on a baking sheet
Cook at high heat (grill or 425°F oven) for 15-20 minutes until charred edges form
Dice pineapple and grill briefly until caramelized
Warm corn tortillas on a dry skillet
Slice pork thinly and pile onto tortillas
Top with grilled pineapple, diced onion, cilantro, and a squeeze of lime
Serve with salsa verde and radish slices

name: Guacamole
steps: Cut avocados in half, remove pit, and scoop flesh into a bowl
Mash with a fork to desired consistency (chunky or smooth)
Finely dice onion, tomato, and jalapeño; chop cilantro
Mix vegetables into avocado
Squeeze lime juice over the top, add salt, and stir
Taste and adjust seasoning
Serve immediately with tortilla chips or as a taco topping

name: Chicken Quesadilla
steps: Season chicken breast with cumin, paprika, salt, and pepper
Cook chicken in an oiled skillet over medium-high heat for 6 min per side; let rest then slice thinly
Sauté sliced bell pepper and onion until softened (3-4 min)
Place a tortilla in a clean skillet; spread shredded cheese on one half
Layer chicken slices and sautéed vegetables on the cheese
Fold tortilla in half and cook 2-3 min per side until golden and cheese melts
Cut into wedges and serve with sour cream, salsa, and guacamole

name: Pad Thai
steps: Soak rice noodles in warm water for 20-30 minutes until pliable; drain
Mix sauce: 3 tbsp fish sauce, 2 tbsp tamarind paste, 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp soy sauce
Heat oil in a wok over high heat; add minced garlic and stir 15 sec
Add shrimp and cook 2 min until pink; push to side
Crack egg into wok and scramble quickly
Add drained noodles and sauce; toss with tongs for 2-3 minutes
Add bean sprouts, toss for 30 seconds
Plate and top with crushed peanuts, lime wedge, and chili flakes

name: Thai Green Curry
steps: Slice chicken breast into thin strips
Heat 1 tbsp oil in a deep pan; add green curry paste (or minced garlic, ginger, chili) and fry 1 min
Add half the coconut milk and stir until it begins to separate slightly
Add chicken strips and cook for 5 minutes
Add remaining coconut milk, sliced bell pepper, and bamboo shoots if available
Simmer for 10 minutes until chicken is cooked through
Add fish sauce and palm sugar to taste
Stir in fresh basil leaves and serve over jasmine rice

name: Tom Yum Soup
steps: Bring 4 cups water or broth to a boil
Add sliced ginger, lemongrass (or lemon zest), and crushed garlic
Simmer for 5 minutes to infuse flavors
Add halved mushrooms and cook 3 minutes
Add shrimp and sliced chili; cook 3-4 minutes until shrimp are pink
Remove from heat; add lime/lemon juice and fish sauce to taste
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve immediately

name: Spaghetti Carbonara
steps: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente; reserve 1 cup pasta water before draining
While pasta cooks, cut bacon into small pieces and fry until crispy; set aside
In a bowl, whisk together egg yolks, grated Parmesan cheese, and black pepper
Drain pasta and immediately toss with bacon in the pan (heat OFF)
Quickly pour egg-cheese mixture over hot pasta and toss vigorously
Add splashes of pasta water to create a creamy sauce (heat activates but won't scramble egg)
Serve immediately topped with extra cheese and black pepper

name: Margherita Pizza
steps: Mix flour, yeast, salt, olive oil, and warm water; knead for 8 min until smooth
Let dough rise in a warm place for 1 hour until doubled
Preheat oven to its highest setting (475-500°F / 250°C) with a baking stone/sheet inside
Stretch dough into a thin round on a floured surface
Spread a thin layer of crushed tomatoes, leaving a border for the crust
Add torn mozzarella pieces and drizzle with olive oil
Bake for 8-12 minutes until crust is puffed and cheese is bubbly and spotted
Top with fresh basil leaves, slice, and serve

name: Bruschetta
steps: Dice fresh tomatoes and combine with minced garlic, chopped basil, olive oil, and salt
Let tomato mixture sit for 10-15 minutes to meld flavors
Slice baguette into ½-inch thick rounds
Brush both sides with olive oil and toast under a broiler or on a grill for 1-2 minutes per side
Rub one side of each toast with a cut garlic clove
Spoon tomato mixture generously onto each toast
Drizzle with balsamic glaze if desired and serve immediately

name: Sushi Rice Bowl
steps: Cook short-grain rice and season with rice vinegar, sugar, and salt while still warm
Slice fresh sashimi-grade fish into thin strips
Slice avocado and julienne cucumber
Divide seasoned rice into bowls
Arrange fish, avocado, and cucumber on top of rice
Sprinkle with sesame seeds and drizzle soy sauce
Add pickled ginger and wasabi on the side; serve

name: Miso Soup
steps: Bring 4 cups of water to a boil in a medium pot
Dissolve 3 tbsp miso paste in a small amount of hot water to prevent clumping
Add sliced mushrooms and diced tofu to the pot; cook 3 minutes
Reduce heat to low (do not boil after adding miso)
Stir in dissolved miso paste
Add a handful of fresh spinach and let it wilt for 30 seconds
Ladle into bowls and garnish with sliced green onions

name: Greek Salad
steps: Dice cucumber, tomato, and red onion into similar-sized pieces
Slice Kalamata olives if desired
Combine vegetables in a large bowl
Cut feta cheese into cubes or crumble over the salad
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, and pepper
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently
Let sit 5 minutes for flavors to meld; serve at room temperature

name: Hummus
steps: Drain and rinse canned chickpeas (or use freshly cooked)
Add chickpeas, tahini (sesame paste), minced garlic, and lemon juice to a food processor
Process while drizzling in olive oil and ice water until very smooth (3-5 min)
Season with salt and cumin to taste
Transfer to a shallow bowl and create a well with the back of a spoon
Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with paprika
Serve with warm pita bread, vegetables, or crackers

name: Falafel
steps: Soak dried chickpeas overnight (do NOT use canned for falafel)
Drain chickpeas and add to food processor with onion, garlic, cilantro, cumin, and salt
Pulse until a coarse, sandy mixture forms (not a paste)
Add 2 tbsp flour and mix; refrigerate for 1 hour
Shape into small balls or discs
Heat oil to 350°F (175°C) and fry falafel for 3-4 minutes until deep golden brown
Drain on paper towels and serve in pita with tahini sauce, pickles, and salad

name: Bibimbap
steps: Cook rice and keep warm
Blanch spinach for 30 sec, squeeze dry, and season with sesame oil and garlic
Julienne carrots and sauté in a little oil with salt until tender-crisp
Sauté sliced mushrooms until golden
Make sauce: mix gochujang (or chili paste), sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar, and vinegar
Fry an egg sunny-side up
Arrange rice in a bowl; place each vegetable in separate sections on top
Top with fried egg, drizzle sauce, sprinkle sesame seeds, and mix before eating

name: Kimchi Fried Rice
steps: Use day-old cold rice for best results
Dice onion finely; mince garlic
Heat oil in a wok over high heat
Sauté onion and garlic until fragrant (1-2 min)
Add rice and stir-fry, breaking clumps, for 3-4 minutes
Season with soy sauce and sesame oil
Push rice aside and fry an egg in the center of the wok
Plate rice with fried egg on top; sprinkle sesame seeds and serve

name: Butter Chicken
steps: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt, garam masala, and lemon juice for at least 1 hour
Grill or pan-fry marinated chicken until charred; set aside
Melt butter in a deep pan; sauté garlic-ginger paste for 1 minute
Add pureed tomatoes and cook until thick (10 min)
Add garam masala, chili powder, and sugar; cook 2 more minutes
Stir in cream to create a smooth, rich sauce
Add grilled chicken pieces and simmer for 10 minutes
Garnish with cream drizzle and fresh cilantro; serve with naan

name: Dal Tadka
steps: Wash and soak yellow lentils (toor/moong dal) for 30 minutes
Pressure cook lentils with turmeric and salt until soft (3-4 whistles)
Mash cooked dal to a smooth consistency and add water to desired thickness
For tadka: heat oil/ghee, add cumin seeds, dried red chilies, and mustard seeds
Add minced garlic, chopped onion, and sauté until golden
Add diced tomatoes and cook until soft
Pour the sizzling tadka over the dal and stir
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with steamed rice or roti

name: Fish Tacos
steps: Season white fish fillets with chili powder, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Pan-fry or grill fish for 3-4 minutes per side until flaky
Shred or thinly slice cabbage for slaw
Make crema: mix sour cream or mayo with lime juice and a pinch of chili
Warm corn tortillas on a dry skillet
Flake fish into chunks and place on tortillas
Top with cabbage slaw, crema, cilantro, and an extra squeeze of lime
Serve with hot sauce on the side

name: Shakshuka
steps: Heat olive oil in a deep skillet; sauté diced onion and bell pepper for 5 minutes
Add minced garlic, cumin, paprika, and chili flakes; cook 1 minute
Add canned crushed tomatoes, salt, and pepper; simmer 10 minutes until thickened
Make small wells in the sauce with the back of a spoon
Crack eggs into the wells, cover, and cook on low 5-7 minutes until whites set but yolks are runny
Sprinkle with fresh parsley or cilantro and crumbled feta if desired
Serve directly from the skillet with crusty bread for dipping

name: Beef Burrito
steps: Season ground beef with cumin, chili powder, garlic powder, salt, and pepper
Cook beef in a skillet over medium-high heat, breaking apart, until browned (8 min)
Warm refried beans in a small saucepan
Cook rice and season with lime juice and cilantro
Warm large flour tortillas in a dry skillet
Layer rice, beans, beef, cheese, diced tomato, and onion in the center of each tortilla
Fold bottom up, then sides in, and roll tightly into a burrito
Optional: grill the burrito seam-side down for a crispy exterior

name: Teriyaki Chicken
steps: Make teriyaki sauce: whisk soy sauce, sugar, minced garlic, and grated ginger in a bowl
Slice chicken thighs into even pieces
Heat oil in a skillet over medium-high heat
Cook chicken pieces 4-5 min per side until golden and cooked through
Pour sauce into the pan and cook 2-3 minutes until it thickens and glazes the chicken
Sprinkle with sesame seeds
Serve over steamed rice with steamed broccoli on the side

name: Ratatouille
steps: Dice eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomato into similar-sized pieces
Heat olive oil in a large pan; sauté diced onion until translucent (5 min)
Add minced garlic and thyme; cook 1 minute
Add eggplant and cook 5 minutes until starting to soften
Add zucchini and bell pepper; cook another 5 minutes
Add diced tomatoes and their juices; season with salt and pepper
Cover and simmer on low for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally
Adjust seasoning and serve as a main course or side dish with crusty bread

name: French Onion Soup
steps: Slice 4-5 large onions into thin rings
Melt butter in a heavy pot over medium-low heat
Add onions and cook slowly for 30-40 minutes, stirring occasionally, until deeply caramelized
Add minced garlic and thyme; cook 1 minute
Add beef or vegetable broth and simmer 15 minutes
Ladle soup into oven-safe bowls
Float a thick slice of toasted bread on each bowl and cover with grated Gruyère cheese
Broil for 2-3 minutes until cheese is bubbly and golden

name: Aloo Gobi
steps: Cut potato into 1-inch cubes and cauliflower into small florets
Heat oil in a pan; add cumin seeds and let them splutter
Add diced onion and sauté until golden (5 min)
Add turmeric, coriander powder, chili powder, and salt
Add diced tomatoes and cook until soft (3 min)
Add potato and cauliflower; stir to coat with masala
Sprinkle water, cover, and cook on low heat for 20 minutes until vegetables are tender
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with roti

name: Classic Caesar Salad
steps: Tear romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces, wash, and spin dry
Cut bread into cubes, toss with olive oil and garlic, and bake at 375°F for 10 min until golden croutons
For dressing: whisk together egg yolk, minced garlic, lemon juice, Dijon mustard, and anchovy paste (optional)
Slowly drizzle in olive oil while whisking to emulsify
Stir in grated Parmesan cheese
Toss lettuce with dressing until well coated
Top with croutons and shaved Parmesan
Add freshly cracked black pepper and serve

name: Chicken Tikka
steps: Cut boneless chicken into 1.5-inch pieces
Mix yogurt, garlic-ginger paste, lemon juice, garam masala, chili powder, turmeric, and salt
Add chicken to marinade, coat well, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours (overnight is best)
Thread chicken onto skewers
Grill or broil for 4-5 minutes per side until charred and cooked through
Brush with melted butter while cooking for extra flavor
Squeeze fresh lemon juice over the tikka pieces
Serve with mint chutney and sliced onion rings

name: Vegetable Quinoa Bowl
steps: Rinse quinoa under cold water and cook in 2:1 water ratio for 15 minutes until fluffy
While quinoa cooks, dice avocado, tomato, and cucumber
Wash and dry baby spinach
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, salt, and pepper for dressing
Fluff quinoa with a fork and divide into bowls
Arrange spinach, diced vegetables, and avocado on top
Drizzle with lemon dressing, sprinkle with seeds or nuts if desired, and serve

name: Kung Pao Chicken
steps: Dice chicken breast and marinate in soy sauce, rice wine, and cornstarch for 15 min
Make sauce: mix soy sauce, vinegar, sugar, sesame oil, and cornstarch slurry
Heat oil in a wok until smoking
Add dried red chilies and Sichuan peppercorns; stir 15 seconds
Add marinated chicken and stir-fry until nearly cooked (3-4 min)
Add diced bell pepper and cook 2 minutes
Add roasted peanuts and pour in the sauce; toss until everything is coated and sauce thickens
Serve immediately over steamed rice
